title: Understanding Arrhenius for Reliability
description: A deep dive into thermal aging models and their application in reliability engineering.

title: Thermal Shock & Coffin-Manson in Microelectronics
description: Learn how thermal cycling affects solder joint fatigue using the Coffin-Manson model. Ideal for consumer electronics.

title: Highly Accelerated Life Testing (HALT)
description: Understanding Highly Accelerated Life Testing (HALT): Principles, History, and Applications
content:
### Case Study Highlights

- Failure rates increased 15% at elevated humidity.
- Common modes: electromigration, dielectric breakdown.
- Mitigation strategies include design rule adjustments and protective coatings.

[Download the full case study PDF](/downloads/microelectronics-case-study.pdf)

title: Bayesian Reliability Predictor (Software)
description: How to estimate software reliability early using Bayesian evidence fusion.
